title: 1.01 PATCH NOTES - A New Hunter, New Contracts & Eva Buffs
summary: Tetra joins the Breach as a new Controller, along with seasonal contracts system, Eva buffs, Shiv adjustments, and various balance improvements.

hunters.description: Tetra - New Controller hunter with stone-shaping abilities including Quake Punch, Volcano Crusher, Landslide, Rockwave, and Tetraform ultimate
Eva: Corrupted Tether damage increased 30/0.07 → 36/0.084, movement speed while using LMB increased 65% → 75%
Eva: Beckon cooldown decreased 20/16/12 → 18/14/10
Eva: Base Health increased 1225 → 1290, Health per level increased 73.5 → 77.4, Base Movement Speed increased 465 → 480
Shiv: Malice and Resolve passive damage decreased by 40%, now correctly applies 2 stacks on Empowered LMB instead of 3
Shiv: Quickflip Movement Speed bonus decreased 12/18% → 7/10%, Movement Speed increased 465 → 475
Shiv: REVERTED -32% damage to LMB and Malice and Resolve from previous hotfix
Void: Now has Hazard immunity to Lava in addition to existing partial hazard immunity
Myth: Fixed issue where Myth would gain Attack Speed when equipping items meant to reduce Attack Speed
Carbine: Fixed LMB being incorrectly nerfed, reverted to proper damage

equipment.description: Recon Runners: Fixed bug where it wasn't providing intended Movement Speed
Emergency Platform: Added to all in-game stores for better abyss traversal options

systems.description: Seasonal Contracts: New mission chain system with two contracts per patch, offering prisma rewards and exclusive cosmetics
Forge Crafting Refunds: Players who crafted before cost reductions received prisma refunds via in-game mail
Prisma Earn Rates: Gem placement multipliers lowered for top 3 (1.6/1.5/1.4 → 1.45/1.4/1.35), Soul boss gems 60 → 50, Final boss gems 100 → 90
Shogi the Metal Knight: Gems dropped reduced from 80 → 30
Progress Bar: Updated treatment to make Forge purchase star-up timing clearer
Tooltips: Updated out-of-game Armory item tooltips for better clarity and readability
Capsule Prisma Sources: Added hover tooltip showing prisma breakdown when received in capsules

maps.description: Circle Adjustments: Reduced frequency of abyss-flooded final circles
Kill Floor Visual: New grid visual added to help visualize the kill floor
Mantling: Camera angle adjustments to improve mantling reliability when terrain hides wall distance
Skyshark Variants: Now spawn with two fast and two furious color variants

client.description: Skyshark Keybinds: Added keybinds in Settings Menu for Skysharks
Finisher VO: VO now plays in menus when previewing finishers
Item Wheel: Fixed item wheel not showing item tooltips
Weekly Missions: Fixed bug where 'place Top 6 while using unique Equipment' mission wasn't granting progress correctly
Dupes in Capsules: Fixed bug where duplicate items in Capsules would return insufficient Prisma (minimum now 225)
Warmup: Fixed bug where spectator view would occasionally appear and skip hero select when finding match while loading into warmup

rawContent: Tetra joins as new Controller with seasonal contracts system, Eva buffs, Shiv balance changes, and various QoL improvements.

title: July 30 - Hotfix Patch Notes
summary: Balance adjustments and progression improvements following the 1.0 launch, including Prisma Gem reward increases and hunter balance tweaks.

hunters.description: Brall and Shiv received nerfs over the weekend to address overperformance
Wukong and Jin's movement adjusted so their LMBs don't make them quite so slippery
Individual Hunter winrates being monitored across different MMRs for future balance adjustments

equipment.description: Prisma crafting cost of daily & weekly specials in the Forge reduced to 1000 Prisma each
Increased the number of items on offer in the Forge specials
All Vaults now guarantee at least one grip or relic
Vault equipment drops have a base 20% chance to be 2 star
Bad-luck protection added to legendary capsule drops

systems.description: Daily quest Prisma rewards increased: 100 → 400 per quest (300% increase)
Overall Prisma gains from both PvE and PvP interactions buffed
Minimum Prisma received from kills increased: 8 → 15 (guaranteed amount)
Prisma multiplier for top 3 lobby placement slightly decreased
Prisma multiplier for placing 5th or 6th increased

maps.description: Monitoring characters with dunking abilities due to updated glider and map layout

modes.description: Arena mode now earns Prisma rewards (previously didn't reward Prisma)
Arena visual upgrades planned for near future

rawContent: Balance adjustments following 1.0 launch with focus on Prisma progression improvements and hunter balance tweaks.

title: June 25 - Bugfixing on the road to 1.0!
summary: Comprehensive bugfix patch addressing hunter-specific issues ahead of the 1.0 launch.

hunters.description: Beebo: Can no longer speed himself up during Tonk Tonk (R) by using Pull Zeep (RMB)
Beebo: Tonk Tonk! (R) no longer snaps camera to origin
Beebo: Super Zeep (RMB) more reliably hits targets above/below
Void: Empowered state now correctly increases Black Hole size
Void: Singularity (R) no longer destroys allied destructibles
Felix: Zero Star skin Embry Bolt (RMB) VFX now match functional width
Ghost/Saros: Models no longer hidden when interrupting Recall with RMB
Eva/Saros: Hunter spells with charges correctly reset on Team Wipe
Shrike: Truetalon Rifle laser correctly climbs high ground

systems.description: Sneaking/Aiming in Death Circle no longer causes stuck state
Bosses now move again after landing

rawContent: Major bugfix patch addressing numerous hunter-specific issues and system bugs ahead of 1.0 launch.

title: June 11 - Warmup, Challenge Rooms, Balancing, and more!
summary: Major content update introducing Warmup mode, Challenge Rooms, Directional Influence system, and extensive hunter balance changes.

hunters.description: Zeph: Cyclone Dash cooldown increased by 0.5 seconds at all levels
Void: Swap cooldown increased by 0.5 seconds at all levels
Ghost: Spike Grenade bonus damage to MK7 Glyph Rifle decreased by 15%
Ghost: Combat Slide cooldown increased by 0.5 seconds at all levels
Carbine: XT3 Heavy Blaster first shot damage reduced by ~45%
Hudson: Turn rate restriction at max heat improved: 25°/sec → 45°/sec
Hudson: Movement speed slow at max heat reduced: 80% → 70%
Hudson: Spun-Up base bullet damage increased ~6.5%
Hudson: Barbed Wire arm duration: 0.6s → 0.45s
Shrike: Base movement speed increased: 475 → 490
Oath: Brightshield now immune to Machine Lasers/Placeable Lasers
Multiple hunter bugfixes for Beebo, Shrike, Elluna, Felix, Saros

equipment.description: EMP Grenades now deal 99999 damage to armor

systems.description: Circle Damage now deals true damage, cannot be mitigated
Most Wanted EXP completion reward capped at daily level limit
Directional Influence (DI) system introduced for knockback control

maps.description: Audio fixes: Base Camp Capture, Anomaly SFX, Recall SFX

modes.description: Warmup mode added - endless deathmatch practice while queueing
Challenge Rooms added - 3 new rooms testing different skills
Tutorial added - covers basics and rewards Ghost unlock
Practice mode improvements - better party management

rawContent: Major feature update introducing Warmup mode, Challenge Rooms, and extensive balance changes in preparation for 1.0.
